thread.title: Paint it red! Fremont Cannon rally set at UNLV
thread.title_full: Paint it red! Fremont Cannon rally set at UNLV

title: Paint it red! Fremont Cannon rally set at UNLV
text:
Paint it red! Fremont Cannon rally set at UNLV Paint it red! Fremont Cannon rally set at UNLV 
The Fremont Cannon stands in the south end zone during the second half of UNLVâ€˜s Mountain West Conference game against Air Force Saturday, Nov. 8, 2014 at Sam Boyd Stadium. (Las Vegas Review-Journal file) Related links By Mark AndersonLas Vegas Review-Journal 
The Fremont Cannon will be taken through UNLV's campus on Monday morning for a painting ceremony. 
It will be taken from Lied Athletic Complex at 11 a.m. to the Student Union, where the red paint will be sprayed on the cannon at 11:15. 
UNLV took possession of the trophy after beating UNR 23-17 on Saturday in Reno in the Battle for the Fremont Cannon. 
Contact Mark Anderson at manderson@reviewjournal.com or 702-387-2914. Follow @markanderson65 on Twitter.
